programmes.show_description: The Spooky House. Rob has recently acquired a 19th century former B&B. Before his restoration, he needs to know if the property deserves its spooky reputation. S4, Ep13
Farm Of Horrors. Anita and her family have an idyllic smallholding, but paranormal phenomena have left them terrified. The team investigate who's there and what they want. S4, Ep14
Teleshopping.
Drew visits a huge collection of 20th century designer furniture in a former paper mill in West Yorkshire. In Middlesbrough, he finds pattern moulds at its last brass foundry. S14, Ep4
Drew visits the medieval Ely Cathedral in Cambridgeshire and finds pew connected a great Victorian architect. Later, he finds a WWII bomber crew seat at an aviation museum. S14, Ep5

Colin Jackson & Phil Daniels. Angus helps Phil Daniels with 1960s and 70s goodies in his Yorkshire home. Then, he finds the 2012 Olympic torch in Colin Jackson's family home. S4, Ep7

A Sinister Séance. Terina has experienced terrifying paranormal activity in her childhood home. Determined to help her, Barri risks his life taking on the aggressive spirit. S5, Ep1
